scripts.cov: babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report lcovonly --report html _mocha -- test/*.test.js -r test/setup.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run cov && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.prepublish: npm run readme | npm run build
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
